author: Rania El Gamal
title: OPEC+ debates biggest ever cut as virus destroys oil demand
description: OPEC and allies are working on a deal for an unprecedented production cut equivalent to around 10% of global supply, an OPEC source said after U.S. President Donald Trump called on oil nations to stop the oil rout caused by the coronavirus pandemic.
content: DUBAI/LONDON/MOSCOW (Reuters) - OPEC and allies are working on a deal for an unprecedented production cut equivalent to around 10% of global supply, an OPEC source said after U.S. President Donald Trump called on oil nations to stop the oil rout caused by the… [+3868 chars]
